name: Killer Clown Identity
description:
Get yourself into this exciting adventure of killer identity. One of the best asymmetrical horror mobile game there is. Enjoy the mysterious storyline and amazing gameplay. The 1vs4 combat is a stupefying mystery action game.

The intense battle starts where the weird gothic killer starts to kidnap survivors from the squad. The scary clown crazy horror killer straps the hostages to the chair and uses exceptionally terrible methods to kill them in a clown horror night. Sure has something to do with the underworld. You, in this asymmetrical horror mobile have the chance to experience having this creepy clown killer identity and winning the 1vs4 combat of the vintage survival horror game. Its as if the obscure mysterious killer has taken over the era of dark and will be dead by light of the day. Play this horror clown game and take four survivors unlike any other multiplayer horror games. Become the creepy clown mysterious killer in the survival horror clown game.

Invade the clown horror night and make the squad dead before daylight. Take avatar of a scary clown, Play the four survivors, dodge them, trap them and kill them! And remember the fear always springs from the obscure.
